tool_description: Use this API to calculate the Body Mass Index of an individual based on their height and weight.
name: Body Mass Index (BMI) Calculator
title: Body Mass Index (BMI) Calculator

api_list.name: Metric [Kilograms]
api_list.description: This endpoint will calculate the BMI of an individual using the imperial measurement system.

required_parameters.name: weight
required_parameters.description: The weight of someone in kilograms (kgs)

required_parameters.name: height
required_parameters.description: The height of someone in meters (m)

api_list.name: Imperial [Pounds]
api_list.description: This endpoint will calculate the BMI of an individual using the imperial measurement system.

required_parameters.name: weight
required_parameters.description: The weight of someone in pounds (lbs)

required_parameters.name: height
required_parameters.description: The height of someone in inches (in)

api_list.name: Weight Category
api_list.description: Retrieve the weight category of an individual based on their BMI
